content: **disclaimer** this is my first ever selfwritten knitting pattern and english is not my mother tongue so please bare with me if there are some mistakes or i did not use the knitting terms correctly all the time **about the beanie/balaclava** the beanie is knit in the round for the whole in the eye section you will bind off a few stiches knit in row and then cast them back on you must switch to double pointed needles for the decreases at the top there should be youtube tutorials for each step in case you need help **materials** 100g soft yarn 110m/50g recommended yarn drops „daisy or cascade yarns „220 heathers & solid double pointed needles 4 5mm eu / 7 us/uk circular needles 4 5mm eu / 7 us/uk on 50cm/20 darning needle stitch markers **gauge** ribbing stitches 1right 1 left on 4 5mm us/uk 7 28 stiches x 28-30 row = 10cm x 10cm **ribbing stitches** in rounds 1stich right 1 stitch left
